questions.question: Is Nokia Overflow free?
questions.answer: YES! It is a free app that you can use right now!

questions.question: What is a Nok?
questions.answer: It is a question that you can ask on Nokia Overflow

questions.question: Can I use Nokia Overflow without an account?
questions.answer: Sadly, no. We must know who you are when you are answering other people's questions or when you are creating a new Nok

questions.question: How can I be sure I get correct answers?
questions.answer: Well, we can not guarantee the answers' correctness, but every single answer that you get has a metric that shows how many other people are agreeing with that answer.
